page.title: 02Recreation in Winterbourne
page.content: Some people, mostly boys, like fishing. We have a large duck pond in Winterbourne in which you can catch Carp. Fish up to 5lbs. in weight have been caught here. There is a stable across the road from the pond where you can have riding lessons from the people who own the horses. In the village there is a play area outside the Ridings High School. We call this the rec, which is short for recreation field. There is a football pitch, cricket pitch and a tennis court. Close by there is a swimming pool which belongs to the Ridings High School but it is open to the public. In the pubs you can play a number of games like darts, cribbage and skittles.
